summary: does not work out of the box

description:
Requires post-install changes, namely enabling realtime priorities by running:
  sudo dpkg-reconfigure jackd2 (and select 'Yes')
then adding yourusername to the audio group:
  sudo addgroup yourusername audio
and then finally reboot.
Also, in the IDE you also need to go Server --> Boot Server before you will be able to hear anything!
summary: Fun but needs work on the installation notes!

description:
Supercollider is clearly one of the best sound synthesis software.
Works without any additional installation (2022 with 3.11.2 version).
